message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $6,000, you get $4,000. A good deal for both of us right now.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, given the changing value of the money.  This allows us both to get a good share while recognizing the inflation.
Bob, the value is dropping fast. Let's be realistic.  I'll take a bit less than my original offer, you get a bit more than your offer.  Deal?
